about_the_game:
Assassins, heroes and zombies, oh my! This new pack of Fantasy Battlers from Michael Galefire will bring some great new character options for your fantasy inspired game. Featuring all kinds of characters suitable for many occasions, including a Darkreaper, Giant Spider, Hero-Mage, Hero-Warrior, assorted Golems plus more!

  • 28 Fantasy Characters
  • Easy to use and formatted for RPG Maker MV/MZ.

    Complete list of characters:

    Asssassin, Cultist, Dark Reaper, Drow, Frogman, Ghost, Giant Spider, Gnoll, Goblin, Guard, Hero-Mage, Hero-Warrior, Hero-Ranger, Hobgoblin, Ice Golem, Imp, Lizard Man, Magma Golem, Ogre, Ruffian, Scout, Skeletal Warrior, Slime, Stone Golem, Swashbuckler, Troll, Wererat, Zombie

    Terms of Use:

    * This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
    * OK to be used in Commercial projects
    * Contents can be edited
    * OK for use in games with gore
    * NOT ok for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Fantasy Battler Pack 1" and "RPG Maker MV - Fantasy Battler Pack 1" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Assassins, heroes and zombies, oh my! This new pack of Fantasy Battlers from Michael Galefire will bring some great new character options for your fantasy inspired game. Featuring all kinds of characters suitable for many occasions, including a Darkreaper, Giant Spider, Hero-Mage, Hero-Warrior, assorted Golems plus more!

    Terms of Use:

    * This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
